Package chess

Class ChessBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.ChessBoard
  • public class ChessBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent a ChessBoard This class contains the members such as current player , chess pieces, game status etc, which is required to simulate the chess game.
    Author:
    Dev Patel and Eric Chan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ChessBoard()
      Create a ChessBoard with a SIDE*SIDE chess cells.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChessBoard

        public ChessBoard()
        Create a ChessBoard with a SIDE*SIDE chess cells. Each cell alternates in white and black color Also, according to the players, the chess pieces are placed in the ranks.

        public void promptUser()

      • hasGameFinalized

        public boolean hasGameFinalized()
        Method which tells if the game has reached a terminal stage. Game reaches to a terminal stage when it is won, draw or resigned.
        Returns:
        true if reached to terminal stage

      • printGameResult

        public void printGameResult()
        Method to print the result of the game
